com.faltro.houdoku.plugins.content

Class MangaTown

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.faltro.houdoku.plugins.content.GenericContentSource
      • com.faltro.houdoku.plugins.content.MangaTown
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContentSource

    public class MangaTown
extends GenericContentSource
    This class contains implementation details for processing data from a specific "content source" - a website which contains series data and images.

    For method and field documentation, please see the ContentSource class. Additionally, the implementation of some common methods is done in the GenericContentSource class.

    See Also:
    GenericContentSource, ContentSource

    • Method Detail

      • search

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>> search(java.lang.String query)
                                                                                 throws java.io.IOException
        Description copied from interface: ContentSource
        Searches the source using a provided query.

        This method does NOT load Series objects, since the amount of series information provided by the search page is often limited. Instead, the following data about each result is retrieved:

        • contentSourceId (int) - the ContentSource's ID field
        • source (String) - the URL to the series page
        • coverSrc (optional) (String) - a URL to an image of the series' cover
        • title (String) - the title of the series
        • details (String) - a generally multiline string which contains the information about the series that will appear in the client's table of search results
        Specified by:
        search in interface ContentSource
        Overrides:
        search in class GenericContentSource
        Parameters:
        query - the text to search for
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of HashMap's where keys are the field names listed above as Strings and values of the matching type
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - an IOException occurred when searching

      • chapters

        public java.util.ArrayList<Chapter> chapters(Series series,
                                             org.jsoup.nodes.Document document)
        Description copied from interface: ContentSource
        Parse all of the chapters on the given Document.

        This method is NOT guaranteed to return all chapters of a given series -- use chapters(Series series) for that.

        Specified by:
        chapters in interface ContentSource
        Overrides:
        chapters in class GenericContentSource
        Parameters:
        series - the series that the chapters are from
        document - the document to find chapters on
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of Chapter's using data from the provided document

      • series

        public Series series(java.lang.String source,
                     boolean quick)
              throws java.io.IOException,
                     LicensedContentException
        Description copied from interface: ContentSource
        Parses the given source as a Series.

        The given source is generally a URL fragment relative to the domain, but this is not explicitly required. The fragment also generally contains a preceding forward slash, but including one is not explicitly required and may depend the source URL's retrieved from search results.

        Specified by:
        series in interface ContentSource
        Overrides:
        series in class GenericContentSource
        Parameters:
        source - the source of the series page
        quick - whether the list of chapters should be "quickly" reloaded, which ensures that only one total HTTP request is made, but does not guarantee that all chapters are loaded
        Returns:
        a Series using the data on the series page
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - an IOException occurred when loading the series page
        LicensedContentException

      • image

        public javafx.scene.image.Image image(Chapter chapter,
                                      int page)
                               throws java.io.IOException
        Description copied from interface: ContentSource
        Retrieves an Image of a chapter page.

        This method generally uses the source property of the given Chapter (via chapter.getSource()), which is almost certainly a "reader" page, where specific pages can often be loaded by appending a page number to the URL in some fashion.

        This method almost certainly has to make two requests: one to load the proper page of the reader, and another to load the direct image URL by processing the reader page's contents.

        When this method is called, chapter.images may not be initialized, since sources almost never provide the number of pages in a chapter before going to the reader itself (which is only loaded by this method). Thus, this method should check whether chapter.images is initialized and, if it is not, this method should determine the number of pages in the chapter and initialize chapter.images with the appropriate size.

        Specified by:
        image in interface ContentSource
        Overrides:
        image in class GenericContentSource
        Parameters:
        chapter - the chapter that contains the desired image
        page - the page number to retrieve, starting at 1
        Returns:
        the Image of the requested page of the given chapter
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - an IOException occurred when loading the image
